messages.title: THE CHOICE HERE IS CLEAR:
messages.content: Local champion, Stop Brexit, Promote local investment

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Family live in Sutton and she has taught in Sutton schools - she will put Sutton, Cheam and Worcester Park first.
Committed to fighting Brexit to protect local jobs, to tackle the climate emergency and grow the economy.
A proven campaigner against harmful cuts and a supporter of fair funding for our schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIB DEMS CAN BEAT THE CONSERVATIVES

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit, Committed to fighting Brexit to protect local jobs, to tackle the climate emergency and grow the economy.
issues.economy: Committed to fighting Brexit to protect local jobs, to tackle the climate emergency and grow the economy.
issues.environment: Committed to fighting Brexit to ... tackle the climate emergency ...

community.content: Hina Bokhari is a proven local champion who has always put Sutton, Cheam & Worcester Park first. ... she always stands up for residents against unfair Tory cuts. ... Make sure you vote for Hina Bokhari in this election, for a local champion, demanding better for Sutton, Cheam & Worcester Park.

leaflet.personalStatement: Hina Bokhari is a proven local champion ... she is fighting for extra funding to put more bobbies on the beat. ... As a former teacher, Hina has always stood up for disadvantaged children and special needs services.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped over 40,000 disadvantaged children to achieve their potential.

personalStories.story: Hina has often stepped forward to ... address injustices and issues she sees.

examples: Damaging hard Brexit, Cuts to public services.
The Tories have let local people down and only appear at elections when they want your vote.
